title: New: Dirty Nice – It's Happening
body:
Some real Daft Punk vibes here on the latest single from the elusive Dirty Nice.

The third official single from the outfit, and another Hype Machine and Spotify smash in waiting, It’s Happening manages to feel effortlessly slick and undeniably cool, whilst maintaining enough of a radio friendly edge to really open their sound up to a larger audience. Check it out below.
